alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Chouteau; Fergus; Hill; Liberty; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Liberty, northeastern Fergus, northeastern Toole, southwestern Blaine, Hill and northeastern Chouteau Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 600 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles north of Chester to near Winifred. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Sandy, Winifred, Azure, Parker School, Beaver Creek, Inverness, Agency, St. Pierre, Gildford, Joplin, Sangrey, Boneau, Box Elder, Hingham, Rudyard, Rocky Boy, Laredo, Whitlash, Kremlin and Judith Landing. This includes the following highways... Highway 191 between mile markers 75 and 87. Highway 2 between mile markers 330 and 378. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Chouteau; Fergus; Hill; Liberty; Toole
